titleInfo.title: Gender Boundaries in Organizational Development: Body and Culture in German Police
Gender Orders Unbound? Globalisation, Restructing and Reciprocity

bibliographicCitation.default:
Müller U (2007)
In: Gender Orders Unbound? Globalisation, Restructing and Reciprocity. Lenz I, Ullrich C, Fersch B (Eds);Opladen, Farmington Hills: Barbara Budrich: 327-343.
bibliographicCitation.wels: Müller, U. (2007): Gender Boundaries in Organizational Development: Body and Culture in German Police. In: Ilse Lenz; Charlotte Ullrich; Barbara Fersch (Hrsg.): Gender Orders Unbound? Globalisation, Restructing and Reciprocity. Opladen, Farmington Hills: Barbara Budrich. S. 327-343.
